data.title: Alliance Branches Around the World
data.meta_description: Do you want to train with us? Find the branch closest to you. Alliance affiliate academies address around the world.
data.text:
Affiliates

It doesn’t matter where you are in the world

you will be able to find one of our ALLIANCE academies.

OVER 300 AFFILIATES

PRESENT IN 28 COUNTRIES

Find an academy close to you

and schedule your experimental class

BRAZIL

______________________________

OUR METHODOLOGY

More than a sport, Jiu Jitsu is a lifestyle. The word Jiu Jitsu means “gentle art" due to its principle of yielding to win, using an opponent’s weight and strength against himself.
